title: Contact
text:
Send a message to start a conversation about your data and modelling needs. Simon will email you right back.

title: Simon G. English
text:
ResearchGate
  
  
    
     Github
  
  
    
     Google Scholar
  

  
  
Simon is a quantitative biologist and scientific writer interested in how and why wild animal populations (especially birds) have changed through time.



Scientific writing (see selected publications)
Programming with R, LaTeX, and Markdown
Geospatial analysis with the Google Earth Engine
Bayesian statistical model building with NIMBLE and Stan
Statistical analysis

Integrated population modelling
Continuous-time hidden Markov modelling
Population viability analysis
Linear, generalized linear, mixed-effects, and censored regression
Stable isotope mixing-modelling

title: Simon G. English
text:
Experience
Independent Contractor | Research Analyst and Scientific Writer | 2021 - present

Analyzed diverse datasets including geospatial, remote-sensing, environmental contaminant, and demographic monitoring data for assessing impacts of human activities on animal populations (see Publications for selected peer-reviewed works).
Contracts filled for the Canadian Wildlife Service and the Pacific Wildlife Research Centre at Environment and Climate Change Canada, the Department of Veterinary Medicine and Epidemiology at the University of California Davis, including collaborations with NGOs, academic, and governmental agencies.

Canada Revenue Agency, Data Analytics and Exploration | Research Analyst | 2022

Analyzed and compared machine learning methods to detect weak signals and patterns in high-dimensional data. Wrote R scripts to conduct simulation experiments using neural-network and random forest algorithms.

title: Scientific Contributions
text:
English SG, Wilson S, Zhao Q, Bishop CA, Moran AJ. 2024. Demographic mechanisms and anthropogenic drivers of contrasting population dynamics of hummingbirds. Biological Conservation 289.
English SG, Wilson S, Bandivadekar R, Graves EE, Holyoak M, Brown J, Tell LA. 2022. Quantifying phenology and migratory behaviours of hummingbirds using single-site dynamics and mark-detection analyses. Proceedings of the Royal Society B 289.
English SG, Hess H, Bishop CA, Porter E, Cheng KM, Elliott JE. 2022. Bioaccumulation and effects of selenium from surface coal mining on an aquatic songbird. Environmental Research 208, 112702.
English SG, Colwell RR, Robinson BW, Ernest HB, Bishop CA, Bandivadekar R, Tell LA. 2021. Demography of two species and one genus of hummingbirds with contrasting population trends in California, USA. Journal of Field Ornithology 92, 475-484.
English SG, Bishop CA, Wilson S, Adam SC. 2021. Current contrasting population trends among North American hummingbirds. Scientific Reports 11.
Read WF, English SG, Hick KG, Bishop CA. 2021. Bluebirds experience impaired hatching success in conventionally sprayed apple orchard habitats: a 31-year study*. Environmental Toxicology and Chemistry 40, 3369-3378.
* Environmental Toxicology and Chemistry’s top 10 Exceptional Papers of 2021
English SG, Sandoval-Herrera NI, Bishop CA, Cartwright M, Maisonneuve F, Elliott JE, Welch Jr. KC. 2021. Neonicotinoid pesticides exert metabolic effects on avian pollinators. Scientific Reports 11.
